meta.job_title: Internal Control over Financial Reporting (ICFR) Advisor

duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervising and coaching ICFR senior analysts in the creation of data flow diagrams, risk assessment, and control identification, in addition to control enhancement and issue remediation.
Leading SOX risk assessments over key corporate initiatives

Supporting the VP – Manager ICFR in ICFR program administration including quarterly reporting and key long-term initiatives. Forming strong relationships with business partners and fostering a collaborative environment are critical to success in this role. This position interacts frequently with all management levels, as well as internal and external auditors.
This is a newly created development position with the expectation of growing into a vice president position.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (Master’s preferred)
